title: Since Fiora was ruined in her rework the game has been ruined to me.
body:
They ruined the game. 

They ruined Fiora.

And everyone who disagrees with me that likes the new Fiora to me is a Fiora hater. 

You hate Fiora and you hate the game because she was a big part of the game.

replies.body: I wish Riot understood what a mistake they made when they ruined Fiora.  I used to love this game.
I still do but it's just not cool how they play god with a champ I've used forever.
I wish I could play god.  I'd make the game better and more enjoyable for everyone.
Why the fuck are you replying to your own replies to your own thread? Did you fail to switch accounts before shilling your own post?
Have you ever continued to have more thoughts before?    These days pompous moderators might think that is spam.

You can edit your own post

Or you can take some time to organize what you want to say instead of delivering an emotion stream of whatever spastic thought pops into your head.

You haven't actually explained anything you say, in all these posts you've basically said
"I don't personally like it and I feel entitled to always get my way"

I don't think Riot cares about what you specifically think. At least not anymore since her rework was a while ago. 

If the game isn't fun anymore, stop playing. No use in complaining about it and feeling more resentful.

Fiora old kit was a terrible design and the new one is much more interesting for Fiora and her opponent.

The visual update was totally unnessecary though

I mean the old Fiora was fun yes, I played her a ton as well. Not quite as much as you, but I loved doing Fiora Jungle a ton! She is still in a good place though. I think she's a bit weak at the moment, and her kit makes her OP or underwhelming.
Do you think I care about her art after you ruined her Lunge Riot?  No I don't.  Art is irrelevant to game play in the World's 1st e-sport.
She has a plecebo ult Riot.   You nerfed her hard.  It was an ugly nerf.  Her lunge was everything and you hacked it.

She can't jungle worth a crap like she used to cause you took her speed away.  Everything but her W was a horrid crippling nerf.  And I... I hate your developers for it.  They just don't care about the game like I do.
